DOC.brief_summary: The purpose three-month study compare quality life ease fit among child wear investigational single-vision contact lenses , commercially market single-vision contact lenses , commercially market multifocal contact lens .
DOC.criteria: Is 8 16 year age . Has permission parent/legal guardian . Is willing able , parent/legal guardian willing able help , follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Has ocular examination last two year . Has never wear contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease . Can successfully fit lens use study . Has 20/25 good best correct visual acuity eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply . Has ocular disease . Has systemic condition may affect study outcome variable . Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health . Has ocular systemic allergy could interfere contact lens wear . Has ocular pathology condition would affect wear contact lens . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
